content: here s my version of the fall pumpkin hat it has ribs a decorative band and cute little curls and leaves on the stem have fun making it it works up super quick sized newborn - adult my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways www facebook com/patternparadise follow my blog www pattern-paradise com text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved
